name: jee-practice-app
description: JEE Practice Platform - Backend, Frontend, and Mobile

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
